parameters.name: NamespaceName
parameters.description: The namespace name of the source instance.

parameters.name: RepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository in the source instance.

parameters.name: RepoNameFilter
parameters.description:
The regular expression that is used to filter repositories.

>  This parameter is valid only when SyncScope is set to `NAMESPACE`.

parameters.name: SyncRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the image synchronization rule.

parameters.name: SyncScope
parameters.description:
The synchronization scope. Valid values:

*   `REPO`: synchronizes the image tags in an image repository that meet the synchronization rule.
*   `NAMESPACE`: synchronizes the image tags in a namespace that meet the synchronization rule.

parameters.name: SyncTrigger
parameters.description:
The mode of triggering the synchronization rule. Valid values:

*   `INITIATIVE`: manually triggers the synchronization rule.
*   `PASSIVE`: automatically triggers the synchronization rule.

parameters.name: TagFilter
parameters.description: The regular expression that is used to filter image tags.

parameters.name: TargetNamespaceName
parameters.description: The namespace name of the destination instance.

parameters.name: TargetRegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the destination instance.

parameters.name: TargetRepoName
parameters.description: The name of the image repository in the destination instance.

parameters.name: TargetUserId
parameters.description:
The user ID (UID) of the account to which the destination instance belongs.

>  If you synchronize images across accounts, you must use the UID.
